name: Vegetable Lentil Soup
description: Lentils are a great meat alternative, providing protein, minerals and fibre.

ingredients.name: low-fat grated cheese or dairy free alternative

preparation: In Multipurpose pot, heat oil over medium-high heat.
Add onion, celery, potato and Dressing Mix. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until onion is softened.
Add Bouillon and lentils. Simmer for 20 minutes.
Using a potato masher, mash soup until slightly thickened but chunky.
Stir in frozen vegetables, grated carrot and tomato paste. Season to taste with Salt and Pepper. Simmer for an additional 10 minutes.
Top each serving with grated cheese, if desired.

products.name: Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing Mix
summary: A classic for a reason, this dressing mix is full of flavour and uber versatile. Use it as salad or nourish bowl dressing, marinade protein including chicken and beef, or glaze grilled veggies and fresh fruit. Any way you serve it, it’s sure to be a hit!

products.name: Vegetable Broth Mix
summary: Make a tasty vegetable broth in a matter of seconds! Same garden-fresh flavour as making it from scratch—just add water!
